message.content:
I need to identify the value of the difference between revenue and cost in the income statement.

Looking at the income statement:
- The total revenue is 791992.51 (from "Total Revenue" line)
- The total cost is 504930.00 (from "Total Cost" line)

The difference between revenue and cost is typically represented as "Gross Profit" in an income statement, which is calculated as Revenue - Cost.

I can confirm this by checking:
791992.51 - 504930.00 = 287062.51

This matches the "Gross Profit" value shown in the income statement.

Therefore, the value of difference between revenue and cost is 287062.51.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '287062.51'}}
```
